3WB.SG.summary: Waberer's International Nyrt. provides full truckload (FTL) transportation services in Europe. The company operates through three segments: International Transportation, Regional Contractual Logistics, and Other. Its activities include long-haul international transport of standard pallet goods, domestic transportation, and storage and distribution of dry and refrigerated goods, as well as international brokerage, and freight and other logistics services. The company also provides international FTL transportation and freight forwarding, and collective transportation services; less than truckload transportation services; warehousing and vehicle repair services to third parties; and insurance services. It operates a fleet of approximately 4,100 truck-trailers. The company was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Budapest, Hungary.
